layer.origins_classes.class.name: Resource Class
layer.origins_classes.class.missing_orig: You do not have a class.
layer.origins_classes.fight_class.name: Battle Class
layer.origins_classes.fight_class.missin: You do not have a class.
origin.origins_classes.warrior.name: Warrior
origin.origins_classes.warrior.descripti: These honorable fighters favor the sword and shield to take down their foes.
origin.origins_classes.archer.name: Archer
origin.origins_classes.rogue.name: Rogue
origin.origins_classes.rogue.description: Usually known to be thieves and robbers, rogues are proficient in ambushes and stealth attacks.
origin.origins_classes.blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
origin.origins_classes.blacksmith.descri: Valued friends of anyone, Blacksmiths are able to create better tools, weapons and armor.
origin.origins_classes.farmer.name: Farmer
origin.origins_classes.farmer.descriptio: Farmers have been known to provide everyone with food for as long as anyone can remember.
origin.origins_classes.merchant.name: Merchant
origin.origins_classes.merchant.descript: Always looking for an additional emerald, Merchants are proficient traders and skilled travellers.
origin.origins_classes.rancher.name: Rancher
origin.origins_classes.rancher.descripti: Making the most of animals, Ranchers are able to gather many useful resources.
origin.origins_classes.miner.name: Miner
origin.origins_classes.miner.description: Miners are the most proficient at harvesting resources from the world.
origin.origins_classes.nitwit.name: Nitwit
origin.origins_classes.nitwit.descriptio: Nitwits aren't really good at anything.
power.origins_classes.less_shield_slowdo: You are slowed down less when protecting yourself with a shield.
power.origins_classes.taunt.name: Taunt
power.origins_classes.taunt.description: Press your active action key to make yourself glow and give yourself Strength III for 1 minute.
power.origins_classes.sneaky.name: Sneaky
power.origins_classes.sneaky.description: Your nameplate is never visible through walls, even when you're not sneaking.
power.origins_classes.stealth.name: In the Shadows
power.origins_classes.stealth.descriptio: When you have been sneaking for 5 seconds, you enter Stealth.
power.origins_classes.clink_and_clank.de: Whilst in Stealth, you cannot wear armor heavier than leather.
power.origins_classes.stealth_core.name: Stealth
power.origins_classes.stealth_core.descr: While in stealth, you make less sound, deal extra damage when attacking an enemy from behind, and entities within 30 blocks of you glow blue. If you are in a dark enough place, you go invisible. You exit Stealth when you stop sneaking.
You can move quicker than others while drawing your bow.
power.origins_classes.hunters_mark.name: Hunter's Mark
power.origins_classes.hunters_mark.descr: When you punch any entity, they glow green.
power.origins_classes.no_projectile_dive: All of your projectiles have increased accuracy.
power.origins_classes.more_attack_damage: Able to use each weapon to its fullest potential, you deal a bit more damage.
power.origins_classes.tamed_animal_boost: Animals you tame receive a permanent buff to their health and strength.
power.origins_classes.tamed_potion_diffu: Your nearby tamed animals also receive potion effects when you drink a potion.
power.origins_classes.more_smoker_xp.des: You receive more experience from cooking food in a smoker.
power.origins_classes.better_crafted_foo: Food crafted by you is more saturating.
power.origins_classes.potion_bonus.name: Qualified Potions
power.origins_classes.potion_bonus.descr: As a last step in potion brewing, you may strengthen(for instant effects) or extend(for lasting effects) the potion effects with water from a cauldron.
You are able achieve higher enchantment levels at an enchantment table.
Equipment you create provides small buffs.
Repairing equipment in an anvil costs less material. Repairing by combining equipment restores more durability.
power.origins_classes.more_crop_drops.de: When harvesting crops, there is a chance that you receive twice the yield.
power.origins_classes.better_bone_meal.d: Bone meal is twice as effective in your experienced hands when used on crops and plants.
power.origins_classes.twin_breeding.name: Twin Births
power.origins_classes.twin_breeding.desc: Animals bred by you have a chance to produce two babies.
power.origins_classes.more_animal_loot.d: You are able to sometimes receive more material from killing animals.
power.origins_classes.trade_availability: Villagers you trade with never run out of resources to trade for you.
power.origins_classes.rare_wandering_loo: You are able to convince wandering traders to offer some of their rarer items to you.
power.origins_classes.no_sprint_exhausti: Sprinting doesn't cause you to exhaust.
power.origins_classes.explorer_kit.name: Explorer Kit
power.origins_classes.explorer_kit.descr: You start the game with a compass, a clock and nine empty maps.
power.origins_classes.no_mining_exhausti: Breaking blocks doesn't cause you to exhaust.
power.origins_classes.more_stone_break_s: You mine stone material quicker than others.
power.origins_classes.tree_felling.name: Timber!
power.origins_classes.tree_felling.descr: You cut down whole trees at once, unless you sneak.
power.origins_classes.more_planks_from_l: You gain two more wooden planks from a single log when crafting.
